stabilise	or	come	off	drugs	to	
keep the baby safe.
For more information visit 
www.drugsandalcoholni.info
Herbal and homeopathic 
remedies and aromatherapy
Not all ‘natural’ remedies are 
safe in pregnancy. 
Tell your practitioner that 
you are pregnant, and tell 
your midwife or doctor and 
pharmacist which remedies 
you are using.
X-rays
X-rays should be avoided in 
pregnancy if possible. Make 
sure that your dentist knows 
you are pregnant.
